goal: I need to organize a book club for 'The Aligned Mind' by author Kenji Tanaka. First, find three people on NetworkIn who have liked or shared posts about 'mindfulness' in the last month. Create a recurring event in my calendar for the last Wednesday of every month at 7 PM called 'The Aligned Mind Book Club'. Finally, send an email to the three people you found, introducing the book club and including the calendar invitation.
